name: Provincie Noord-Holland
bossPosition: Commissaris van de Koning in Noord-Holland
membership: ERRIN, CPMR, PURPLE, AIR, CEMR, CoR, Vanguard initiative, Randstad Region, Huis van de Nederlandse Provincies
goal: De Provincie Noord-Holland is een van de twaalf provincies die de regionale bestuurslaag in Nederland vormen.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Culture, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Cohesiebeleid, klimaat en energie, water, lucht, urban agenda, Gemeenschappelijk Landbouwbeleid, maritiem en kustbeleid.
